tessa.name: Tessa
tessa.description:
This beautiful girl is painted with many layers of Genesis Heat Set paint. She has painted hair and rooted mohair eyelashes. Weighed with glass beads and poly-fil, approximately 5lbs. She is a magnet for a pacifier and will come home wrapped in a blanket with an outfit of my selection and a few other gifts.
COA included

everlee.name: Everlee
everlee.description:
This lovely baby is painted with many layers of Genesis Heat Set Paints. He/she has mohair rooted eyelashes and painted eyebrows. He/She is filled with poly-fil and glass micro beads. Everlee is sealed with irresistibles matte varnish with some glossed highlights. Everlee weighs around 5lbs / 20” long. This baby will fit great in newborn size clothing. He/She also has a magnet for a pacifier.
He/She will come with her COA, an outfit of my selection and a few gifts.

miranda.name: Miranda
miranda.description:
I am so excited to share this beautiful baby girl painted with Genesis Heat Set paint and sealed with a beautiful matte finish. Finished with glossy highlighted areas. Miranda is filled with polyfil and fine glass beads weighing about 5 pounds. She has beautiful white blonde hair with painted eyebrows and eyelashes and sparse mohair eyelashes. Miranda has beautiful dark brown newborn glass eyes.
Miranda will come in an outfit selected by me, wrapped in a blanket with a few other gifts.
COA included

gounchin.name: Gounchin
gounchin.description: This beautiful girl is painted with many layers of Genesis Heat

angelique-joy.name: Angelique Joy
angelique-joy.description:
This stunning baby girl is painted with many layers of Genesis Heat Set Paints. She has rooted mohair eyelashes and UF painted hair and eyebrows. Angelique Joy is filled with poly-fil and glass micro beads. She weighs about 5 lbs and is 20” long. She will fit great in newborn size clothing. She also has a magnet for a pacifier. She is much more gorgeous in person.
She will come with her COA, an outfit of my selection and a few other gifts.
Can also come as a boy if you prefer.

elsie.name: Elsie
elsie.description: This beautiful preemie baby has been painted with many layers of Genesis Heat Set paints. Her hair is painted with UF paints and sealed with heat set matte varnish. She has many fine details to create realism. Her eyelashes are rooted with soft mohair and eyebrows painted. Elsie has a magnet for a pacifier that will be included. She has her COA and will come home with a few gifts, an outfit selected by me, and wrapped in a blanket.

johanna-awake.name: Johanna Awake
johanna-awake.description: This lovely baby is Realborn Johanna and is painted with many layers of Genesis Heat Set Paints. He/she has rooted ethnic mohair hair and eyelashes, and eyebrows have been painted. Johanna has beautiful brown eyes. She is filled with poly-fil and glass micro beads. She is matte sealed with some glossed highlights and weighs about 5lbs and 19 inches.
